title: Firefox Browser windows unable to use Dark Theme after MacOS Big Sur update to 11.5.2
content:
Hi.

After the recent update of MacOS Big Sur to 11.5.2, my Firefox browser cannot display web pages in dark mode. I've tried reinstalling Firefox, reinstalling MacOSX, used Time Machine, changed Mac display settings, changed Firefox settings and nothing works. I've attached a screenshot of how my monitor looks after the update. The background is always white If anybody has a suggestion of how to fix this or what is wrong, please let me know so others can benefit from it if they have the same problem.

Notice the white background behind
creator: alnnewt

title: 'Sync settings' option omits the 'Search Shortcuts' configuration
content:
After syncing two of my Windows computers (10 & 11), I noticed that the Search Shortcuts configuration of the FF Dev browser on one computer (the more recently updated browser) did not sync to the other computer's FF Dev browser. Both computers show that settings/options should sync.

I suppose this is more of a bug report than a question, but if anyone has any advice, I would appreciate hearing it.
creator: polyversialmind

title: Loading Facebook
content: I and it appears many others are now not able to load Facebook properly with Firefox. Do you plan on fixing this problem?
creator: coolcar.richardson

title: Firefox won't load web pages, but problem gets temporarily fixed when I quit the application
content: Firefox has become my new favorite web browser of choice. I recently started having a problem, however. After I have been using firefox for a period of time, it stops loading webpages for me. I will search something or type a website into the search bar but nothing will happen. I know my internet is working because other browsers work just fine. The interesting thing is that when I close out of firefox and quit the application on my mac and reopen, the problem is resolved for a short period of time then it will start happening again. Any tips of what to do?
creator: lvjnglng
